item.title: Self-Signed SSL Certificates with Nginx and Apache
item.description: Since having the opportunity to discuss web application security (part 1, part 2) recently on the podcast, I thought it was a good time to have a deeper look into SSL/TLS (Transport Layer Security). There are plenty of good resources online discussing the technical side of the topic. However, at a high level, point-to-point encryption and server identification are the two problems it attempts to solve.
